publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5160 Michael Russell: Scotland’s Historic Environment - A Unique Resource for Our Economy and Our People—That the Parliament welcomes the enthusiasm, passion and co-operation shown by all of the participants at the first Summit for the Built and Historic Environment held at the Bute Hall in Glasgow on Tuesday 3 November 2009 and recognises the valuable resource for the Scottish people and economy represented by Scotland’s rich and varied heritage.
